title: pittup-piDittiDavE
sahitya:
pittup-piDittiDavE pEraruL kUru murugA cittam enadun sIraDi sErat-tuDikkum


anupallavi

  nittam unnai ninaindu ninaindu ennuLLam bhakt paravasha veLLam pAyavE tuLLum


caraNam    kattik-kadari oru kanru tAyiDam ODa ettuNai Aval koLLum enbadaip-pOla
attanai Aval koNDu aDiyEnum ODi vandu attanE unnaik-kaNDu Anandak-kUttADum
